author: Special Correspondent
text:
The finals of The Hindu-Young World painting competition will be held at the Thiagarajar Polytechnic College in the city on March 13.

The event is an integral part of the NIE programme of The Hindu and sponsored by Thyrocare.

The finals will start at 9.30 a.m. and the shortlisted students should report at the venue by 9 a.m. Intimation letters have already been sent to the students through emails whose work has been short-listed and the students should bring them to the venue along with the school identity card.

The topics for the finals and the painting sheet will be given at the venue and the contestants should bring with them all other material needed for painting.

The paintings will become the sole property of The Hindu and will not be given back to the contestants.
title: The Hindu- Young World painting contest final on March 13
